h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Sweet Ice Location
content: Continue onwards, sticking to the right, and head through another red building's opening. Go up the staircase, and take a right, and another right to see a building just in front of you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sweet_Ice.md', within the main section titled 'Sweet Ice', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Sweet Ice Location'.
The content is as follows:
Continue onwards, sticking to the right, and head through another red building's opening. Go up the staircase, and take a right, and another right to see a building just in front of you.
